FuncDef: This command configures the Diff-Serv Class Type (CT) for an LSP, the LSP primary path, or the LSP secondary path. The path level configuration overrides the LSP level configuration. However, only one CT per LSP path will be allowed as per RFC 4124.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Diff-Serv Class Type number. Values-0 - 7.
